001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003import org.relationlearn.filters.FilterGroup;
004import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentNode;
005import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentRelation;
006import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
007import weka.core.Attribute;
008import weka.core.Instance;
009import weka.core.Instances;
010
011/**
012 * Utility class that provides the generation of instances from a given
013 * RelationDigraph and a combination of filters encapsulated in a FilterGroup.
014 * 
015 * @see RelationDigraph
016 * @see FilterGroup
017 */
018public class InstanceGenerator {
019    
020    private final RelationDigraph GRAPH;
021    private final FilterGroup FILTER;
022    
023    /**
024     * Constructs a new Instances generator with {@code graph} as the source
025     * of data and {@code filter} as the TextFilter objects container.
026     * 
027     * @param graph the RelationDigraph from which the data will be extracted
028     * @param filter the FilterGroup that contains the filter to be applied
029     * to the data extracted
030     */
031    public InstanceGenerator(RelationDigraph graph, FilterGroup filter) {
032        this.GRAPH = graph;
033        this.FILTER = filter;
034    }
035    
036    /**
037     * Generates an Instance object for each ArgumentRelation present in the
038     * graph passed to the constructor and packs all those Instance objects in
039     * an Instances one.
040     * 
041     * @return the Instances object containing all instances obtained from
042     * the RelationDigraph throught the application of the filters contained
043     * in the FilterGroup passed in the constructor
044     * 
045     * @see weka.core.Instance
046     * @see weka.core.Instances
047     */
048    public Instances getGraphInstances() {
049        Instances ins = FILTER.getGroupDataset();
050        Attribute classAttr = ins.classAttribute();
051        for(ArgumentNode an : GRAPH) {
052            ArgumentRelation relation = an.getTargetRelation();
053            if(relation != null) {
054                Instance in = generateInstace(an.getArgumentNodeText(), 
055                        relation.getTarget().getArgumentNodeText());
056                in.setClassValue(relation.getArgumentRelationType().toString());
057                /*in.setValue(classAttr, 
058                        relation.getArgumentRelationType().toString());*/
059                ins.add(in);
060            }
061        }
062        return ins;
063    }
064    
065    private Instance generateInstace(String response, String hypothesis) {
066        return FILTER.createInstanceUsingFilters(response, hypothesis);
067    }
068
069}
